texto: from other tasks. 2) Capture or acquire knowledge and skills. 3) Share knowledge and skills across the organization. c) Share knowledge assets throughout the organization. This activity consists of the following tasks: 1) Establish a taxonomy to organize knowledge assets. NOTE 1 The taxonomy includes the following: i) Definition of the boundaries of domains and their relationships to others. ii) Domain models capturing essential common and different features, capabilities, concepts, and functions. iii) An architecture for a family of systems within the domain, including their common and different features.
